name: Why Did the Chicken Cross the Road (Sadness Lubricant)
name_original: Why Did the Chicken Cross the Road (Sadness Lubricant)
description:
Controls: 
Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys
Jump: X or Space Bar
Glide: C or I or Left Click
Fullscreen: doesn't work? zoom in on web browser to make it bigger (sorry)

Why Did the Chicken Cross the Road is a troll / rage platformer based heavily on Mario Maker 2. Play through ten levels where you try and avoid things that can kill chickens, when every time you die, you go to a sub level to help learn what you died too. Please enjoy the soothing Cluck de Lune to help contribute to the learning process.

Made by Jackson Froehlich and Andrew Raynor, featuring music by Mobula and  Sadness Lubricant, all for Ludum Dare 50.
